comments.html: Probably not. You say exactly the same things on Facebook that I would say on Twitter. It's justa  case of which is your primary medium. I much prefer Twitter for its openness, and dislike Facebook for its targeting. Easy choice for me to make.
comments.name: Etherealmind

comments.html: I guess you're right. Still, the idea of broadcasting 140-character "thoughts" somehow doesn't sit well with me. Maybe I'm too old-fashioned 8-)
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
